markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Paired](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1388)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Teleportation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=156" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 88

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** each rune applied to a separate item that has pockets

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These runes always come in pairs and can be applied to a garment's pockets to be activated.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> command;  **Frequency** once per day;  **Requirements** The _paired_ items are both invested, typically by two different characters, and are within 100 feet of each other; **Effect** Items in the pockets (up to 10 negligible Bulk items or 1 light Bulk item per pocket) trade places via teleportation.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 5"
pfs="Standard"
>
Paired
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 88

**Price** 150 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 9"
pfs="Standard"
>
Paired (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 88

**Price** 650 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You can activate these runes at a distance of up to 1 mile.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 13"
pfs="Standard"
>
Paired (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 88

**Price** 2,750 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You can activate these runes at any distance as long as they're on the same plane.
name: Paired (Greater)
